back_in_stock.title: This product is out of stock but will come back soon!
back_in_stock.subtitle: Subscribe below. We will send you an email when this product will be back in stock.
back_in_stock.success_subtitle: Your registration has been successful. You will receive an e-mail as soon as it comes back in stock.

customization.title: Engraving - Personalize your jewelry
customization.subtitle: We will adapt the size of your text by hand so that the result is as harmonious as possible. Each engraving is therefore unique. Please note that personalized jewelry cannot be returned. Please note that special characters and emojis are not accepted and will not be taken into account during engraving.

certifications.made_in_france_description: All our products are made in France in one of our 9 partner workshops to preserve employment and French know-how.
certifications.argent_recycle_description: Our commitment to offer you a sustainable jewelry is first of all the use of recycled metals. To date, 100% of the silver used in this creation is recycled silver.
certifications.pierre_naturelle_description: The stone used in this jewel comes from a natural mine more respectful of the environment.
certifications.emballage_recycle_description: Delivery packaging made of recycled and certified fibers from sustainably managed forests / 100% recycled gift packaging from Tetra Pak.
certifications.plaquage_certifie_rjc_description: This jewel is plated with 3 micron gold, partly recycled (in Switzerland), by a workshop certified Responsible Jewellery Council.
certifications.tracabilite_de_la_pierre_description: We know the exact origin of the stone used in this jewel and we make sure to the best of our ability that the production conditions respect basic social and environmental standards.
certifications.artisan_dart_description: Their attribution attests to both the training and professional experience that characterize the know-how of the craft sector. The quality of craftsman is attributed to persons who carry out an activity listed in the classification of crafts.
certifications.coton_certifie_gots_description: GOTS certification certifies that our cotton is grown without GMOs, chemicals, and with traceability from the cotton fields to your home, including transaction certificates at every step.

custom_checkout.delivery_home_description: Delivery in {{min_delay}} to {{max_delay}} working days at home
custom_checkout.delivery_service_point_description: Delivery in {{min_delay}} to {{max_delay}} working days to the relay point of your choice
custom_checkout.alert_description: Your cart contains a personalized product. The preparation time of your order may be extended by one or two working days.
custom_checkout.preorder_description: Your cart contains a preorder product. Your order will be sent when all products are available.

header.customer_service_text_html: Do you have a question or need help? We are available Monday to Friday from 9am to 5pm.

delivery.no_packaging_title: I want my order to be sent via the least amount of packaging possible
delivery.no_packaging_text: We will minimize the packaging needed to send your order to limit the ecological footprint. Please note that jewelry can be sent in the same box. The gifts and other goodies that we offer to you during certain orders will also be removed from your package.

charity.title: Charity
charity.description_html: With your order, we will donate {{ amount }} to the association of your choice below:
charity.ruban_rose_description: The Pink Ribbon is now the global symbol of Breast Cancer Awareness Month.
charity.l214_description: L214 is a French non-profit association for the defense of animals.
charity.la_croix_rouge_description: The French Red Cross strives to prevent and alleviate human suffering in all circumstances. It aims to protect life and health and to ensure respect for the human person.
charity.epic_description: Epic is a non-profit organization that fights to improve the lives of the most disadvantaged.
charity.solidarite_femmes_description: Fédération Nationale Solidarité Femmes is a French association born from the feminist movement to fight against violence against women.
charity.fpnh_description: The Fondation pour la Nature et l'Homme is a French foundation recognized as being of public utility, whose purpose is to raise awareness about the environment.

features.secure_payment_description: By credit card (Visa, MasterCard, CB), PayPal, Apple Pay...
features.fast_delivery_description: From 48h depending on the delivery method chosen
features.sav_description: A question, need help? Monday to Friday from 9am to 5pm.
features.return_description: In France with no minimum purchase
features.repair_description: Jewelry received broken ? We take care of you

reinsurance.question: Any questions?
reinsurance.return: Free returns in France within 30 days
